description: This update is dedicated to the comic genuis Benny Hill. (Benny Hill fans will see why.) Cowgirl is strapped to a human powered fucking machine. She must pedal to avoid being whipped. Meanwhile Rose gets fucked as Cowgirl pedals. After a powerful orgasm, Rose is released from the Fuckcycle and strapped to a rack. She is whipped, and given electro-torture in two long sessions. She describes one orgasm as 'going further than any normal orgasm'. Lastly Rose is given a rewarding comfortable suspension.
title: Rose and Cowgirl
